settings.question: Who can become a Plus Member?
settings.answer: Any registered business, restaurant, caterer, or professional in the foodservice industry can apply for Plus Membership.

settings.question: How much can I save?
settings.answer: Savings vary by product, but most members save 2-15% on their purchases with wholesale pricing. High-volume buyers can save even more with our Business Membership tier.

settings.question: Is there a minimum order requirement?
settings.answer: No, there are no minimum order requirements. You'll see member pricing on every qualifying item regardless of order size.

settings.question: Can I cancel my membership?
settings.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime. Memberships are non-refundable but will remain active until the end of your billing period.

settings.question: How do I see member pricing?
settings.answer: Once logged in with an active membership, you'll automatically see member pricing displayed on all product pages and in your cart.

settings.hero_description: Join our Plus Membership program and save on every purchase with special wholesale pricing available only to members.
settings.annual_features:
• All member benefits
  • Unlimited wholesale pricing access
  • Priority customer support
settings.business_features:
• All annual membership benefits
  • Additional bulk pricing discounts
  • Dedicated account manager
  • Net 30 payment terms available
settings.step1_description: Create your account and choose your membership level
settings.step2_description: We'll verify your information (usually within 24 hours)
settings.step3_description: Once approved, you'll immediately see member pricing on all eligible products
